content:
Hello there. I've just started learning Rust from rustlings and I'm love with it. I've doing Python for 12 years now, happy with it but looking into learning new cool stuff. If someone is rewriting any Python tool to Rust (personal tool or community tool), let me know and maybe I can help with. One of my favorite ways of learning is contributing. Today I'm mostly working with Python FastAPI and I'm learning Rocket to understand Rust inside my current perspective.
Let me know how deep the rabbit hole is.
